description:
Musala Soft is the largest Bulgarian software services company employing more than 480 software specialists in 4 locations across Bulgaria and Macedonia. With more than 200 clients in 25 countries, we are focused entirely on software development services with deep expertise and experience in industries such as: ICT, Telecoms, Banking, Financial services and Insurance, Public sector, Industrial Manufacturing (Automotive) & Healthcare.
Musala Soft clients are challenging, innovative and trendsetting enterprises - we work with companies like Deutsche Telekom, IBM, KBC, VMware, SAP, HP, Cisco and other. They recognize us as a trusted partner, committed to professionalism, quality and value.Â 
Musala Soft has a wide range of technologies and partners with leading technology vendors: IBM-Premium Business Partner; Microsoft - Gold Partner; Oracle-Gold Partner; VMWare-Professional Solution Provider; Red Hat - Ready Business Partner.
The company is certified according to international standards: ISO 9001:2008, ISO 27001:2005, ISO 14001:2004, ISO 26000.
